nodes.bodyText: Huh, was this all just copy pasta from the main VSConfig resolve?

Not exactly.  There are differences, but I don't think they matter.  For example, this code ignores the script and just treats a query that specified a script as if it was unmapped.  Which, honestly, seems more like a bug waiting to happen than anything else.  (The parser already enforces not sending a script, so I'm not worried that going to suddenly start getting script errors)
